KSE PWSLIB 2-5-1

  • All Classes

Package org.jpws.pwslib.data

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    PwsBlockInputStream
    Interface defines a low-level read streaming device of data blocks of a fixed length.
    PwsBlockOutputStream
    Interface defines a low-level write streaming device for data blocks of a fixed length.
    PwsFileListener
    Interface defines a state change notification method for listeners for PWS record lists and their modifications.
    PwsRawFieldReader
    Interface extending an iterator over PwsRawField objects decrypted from the persistent state of a PWS file.
    PwsRawFieldWriter
    Interface defining a device designed to write objects of type PwsRawField to an encrypted output stream.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ContextFile
    A ContextFile is the combination of ApplicationAdapter and a filepath.
    HeaderFieldList
    A descendant of RawFieldList that limits the range of valid elements to field types 0..254 and supplies additional functionality specific to header-field lists.
    PwsFile
    Top level structure of this library to represent a Password Safe (PWS) database file.
    PwsFileEvent
    Events available for PwsFileListener objects.
    PwsFileFactory
    This is a singleton factory class with static methods used to load and save PasswordSafe files of all known formats.
    PwsFileHeaderV3
    This class represents the header fields of a PasswordSafe V3 database (persistent state) and allows to obtain objects enabling to read and decrypt the remainder of the file or to save the header to a new persistent state.
    PwsFileInputSocket
    PwsFileInputSocket organises data input from an ordinary underlying data stream in order to read a persistent state of a PWS file and make its data content available to the user in a decrypted and convenient form.
    PwsFileOutputSocket
    PwsFileOutputSocket organises data output to a single underlying data stream for the purposes of creating a persistent state of a PWS file.
    PwsIgDupRecordList
    This is a subclass of PwsRecordList which does not throw DuplicateEntryException.
    PwsPassphrase
    PwsPassphrase represents a sequence of characters which is especially protected against uncoverage through attacking tools analysing the JVM memory.
    PwsPassphrasePolicy
    This class defines a policy that is used to generate a random password.
    PwsRawField
    A RawField contains a cleartext (decrypted) value of a single PWS data field (as it typically occurs in a PWS file).
    PwsRecord
    This class is a container for data fields belonging to a Password Safe database entry.
    PwsRecordList
    Identification
    Top level structure of this library to represent a list of PWS records (PwsRecord).
    RawFieldList
    RawFieldList implements a sorted map from field names (0..255) into type PwsRawField.
